name: Firelit (sneezyboye)
description:
My first ever game jam submission made for Weekly Game Jam 250 in a short amount of time, so, go easy on me :)

Expect more updates and fleshing of the game!

You are a dextrous wizard, hunting trolls in the deep, dark caves. Hurling fireballs and OD'ing off potions in the dark caverns. Dungeons are procedurally generated, try to get as far as possible and the highest score!

Controls 

W, A, S and D - Movement

Mouse - Look Around

Click - Shoot Fireball

ESC - Pause Game

Known Bugs:

Starting rooms may be blocked off, just restart if that happens!
